questions.question: How much risk are you comfortable taking with your investments?
questions.description: Higher risk can lead to higher rewards, but also bigger losses.

questions.question: What is your planned investment time horizon?
questions.description: Longer horizons can tolerate more short-term volatility.

questions.question: Do you want an active or passive portfolio?
questions.description: Active portfolios rebalance or adapt frequently. Passive portfolios stay stable over time.

questions.question: Which themes are you interested in?
questions.description: Choose token categories you believe in. You can select multiple.

options.label: DeFi Blue Chips
options.description: Major decentralized finance protocols (Aave, Uniswap, etc).

options.label: Stablecoins
options.description: Low-volatility assets pegged to fiat currencies.

options.label: Layer 2 Ecosystem
options.description: Tokens from networks like Arbitrum, Optimism, zkSync, etc.

options.label: Real-World Assets (RWA)
options.description: Crypto tokens backed by real-world assets (e.g. US Treasuries).

options.label: Meme Coins
options.description: High-volatility, community-driven tokens like DOGE, PEPE.

options.label: Open to anything
options.description: No specific preference — show me everything.

questions.question: Are there any types of assets you want to avoid?
questions.description: This helps us filter out assets you’re not comfortable with.

options.label: High Volatility
options.description: Tokens that fluctuate wildly in price.

options.label: Illiquid Tokens
options.description: Hard to trade or sell due to low volume.

options.label: Manually Enter Token List
options.description: Let me hand-pick my own asset pool.

questions.question: What is your level of experience with crypto investing?
questions.description: We’ll adjust the strategy recommendations accordingly.

questions.question: Anything else you want us to know?
questions.description: Optional. This helps personalize your portfolio further.
